thread.title: Grammys 2017: Demi Lovato goes braless in see-through dress
thread.title_full: Grammys 2017: Demi Lovato goes braless in see-through dress

title: Grammys 2017: Demi Lovato goes braless in see-through dress
text:
LIFE COACH: Nick told Demi to explore her sexy side Inside the 2017 Grammy Awards Monday, 13th February 2017 Take a look into the 2017 Grammy Awards 1 / 157 “Nick Jonas told me to be sexy” Demi Lovato 
The red carpet was only the beginning of Demi's excitement, as the singer performed during the ceremony. 
Taking to the stage, Demi fronted a musical tribute for legendary pop group the Bee Gees. 
Singing a medley of their biggest hits — everything from Night Fever to Tragedy — the young star wowed the crowd with her vocal abilities. 
Getty DISCO FEVER: Demi belted out Bee Gees' biggest hits 
Barry Gibb, the only living member of the Bee Gees, was spotted on camera nodding along to the performance. 
Demi was nominated for Best Pop Vocal Album for Confident, but lost the title to the night's big winner Adele . 
However, she didn't let the lack of a win ruin her night. 
Taking to Twitter after the Grammys, Demi told her 40 million followers: "Still can't believe I was nominated and now I get to perform tonight?! Dreams come true people!" Related Articles
